verses.text: \w I|strong="H1571"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* praise thee, \w O|strong="H2142"\w* lord, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* whole heart: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* thou hast heard \w the|strong="H0853"\w* words \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mouth. \w I|strong="H1571"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* sing praise \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sight \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* angels:

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* will worship towards thy holy temple, \w and|strong="H3658"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* will give glory \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thy name. \w For|strong="H5921"\w* thy mercy, \w and|strong="H3658"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* thy truth: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* thou hast magnified thy holy name \w above|strong="H5921"\w* all.

\w In|strong="H1697"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* day soever \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1697"\w* call upon thee, hear \w me|strong="H7592"\w*: thou \w shall|strong="H1697"\w* multiply strength \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* soul.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* kings \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0127"\w* give glory \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* heard all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy mouth.

\w And|strong="H3389"\w* let them sing \w in|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* ways \w of|strong="H3225"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3225"\w*: \w for|strong="H0518"\w* great \w is|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* glory \w of|strong="H3225"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3225"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H3956"\w* high, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* looketh \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* low: \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* high \w he|strong="H0518"\w* knoweth afar \w off|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w If|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* walk \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* midst \w of|strong="H1121"\w* tribulation, thou wilt quicken \w me|strong="H6168"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou hast stretched forth thy hand \w against|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wrath \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w enemies|strong="H3389"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy right hand hath saved \w me|strong="H6168"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H1323"\w* \w repay|strong="H7999"\w* \w for|strong="H1323"\w* \w me|strong="H1580"\w*: thy mercy, O Lord, endureth \w for|strong="H1323"\w* ever: O despise not \w the|strong="H0853"\w* work \w of|strong="H1323"\w* thy hands.
